# participatesInCycle

**Type Property**

The window participates in the window cycle for use with the Cycle Through Windows menu item.

## Declaration

```swift
static var participatesInCycle: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior { get }
```

## Window cycling

- **ignoresCycle**: The window isn’t part of the window cycle for use with the Cycle Through Windows menu item.
